title: WTB: T202 Hassan Cobb Steals Third
author: deltufjp2

posts.post_title: WTB: T202 Hassan Cobb Steals Third
posts.post_content: Looking for a Cobb Steals Third in any of its varieties. If you are interested in moving one, preferably in the PSA 2-4 range, please PM me.
Thanks to those who have PM'd, yes I am open to all variations of this card.

[quote name="deltufjp2" post=1124071]Thanks to those who have PM'd, yes I am open to all variations of this card.[/QUOTE]

I don't want to hijack the thread, and of course the OP has dibs on any offers that have been made... However should any Cobb Moriarty- Cobb Steals Third remain after his deal is done, I'd be interested.  I would also be looking in the 2-4 range.
